name: Build Android APK

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main, master ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main, master ]
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-22.04
    
    steps:
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v4

    - name: Set up Python
      uses: actions/setup-python@v5
      with:
        python-version: '3.11'

    - name: Install system dependencies
      run: |
        sudo apt-get update
        # Remove conflicting libunwind packages if present
        sudo apt-get remove -y libunwind-14-dev || true
        # Fix any broken packages first
        sudo apt-get --fix-broken install -y
        # Install libunwind-dev first to satisfy gstreamer dependency
        sudo apt-get install -y libunwind-dev || true
        sudo apt-get install -y \
          python3-pip \
          build-essential \
          git \
          ffmpeg \
          libsdl2-dev \
          libsdl2-image-dev \
          libsdl2-mixer-dev \
          libsdl2-ttf-dev \
          libportmidi-dev \
          libswscale-dev \
          libavformat-dev \
          libavcodec-dev \
          zlib1g-dev \
          libgstreamer1.0-0 \
          libgstreamer1.0-dev \
          libgstreamer-plugins-base1.0-dev \
          gstreamer1.0-plugins-base \
          gstreamer1.0-plugins-good \
          libffi-dev \
          libssl-dev \
          autoconf \
          automake \
          libtool \
          libtool-bin \
          libltdl-dev \
          pkg-config \
          cmake \
          ninja-build \
          unzip \
          zip \
          openjdk-17-jdk \
          lld \
          ccache

    - name: Set JAVA_HOME
      run: |
        echo "JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-17-openjdk-amd64" >> $GITHUB_ENV

    - name: Cache buildozer
      uses: actions/cache@v4
      with:
        path: |
          ~/.buildozer
          .buildozer
        key: ${{ runner.os }}-buildozer-${{ hashFiles('buildozer.spec') }}
        restore-keys: |
          ${{ runner.os }}-buildozer-

    - name: Cache Gradle
      uses: actions/cache@v4
      with:
        path: |
          ~/.gradle/caches
          ~/.gradle/wrapper
        key: ${{ runner.os }}-gradle-${{ hashFiles('**/*.gradle*', '**/gradle-wrapper.properties') }}
        restore-keys: |
          ${{ runner.os }}-gradle-

    - name: Install Python dependencies
      run: |
        python -m pip install --upgrade pip
        # Pin Cython to < 3.0 to fix pyjnius compatibility (long type issue)
        pip install buildozer "cython<3" virtualenv

    - name: Pre-download Gradle
      run: |
        # Pre-download Gradle to avoid transient 503 errors during build
        mkdir -p ~/.gradle/wrapper/dists/gradle-8.0.2-all
        for i in 1 2 3; do
          wget -q https://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-8.0.2-all.zip -O /tmp/gradle-8.0.2-all.zip && break
          echo "Gradle download failed, retrying in 10 seconds..."
          sleep 10
        done
        if [ -f /tmp/gradle-8.0.2-all.zip ]; then
          echo "Gradle downloaded successfully"
        fi

    - name: Clean previous build artifacts
      run: |
        # Clean pyjnius build artifacts to force rebuild with correct Cython
        rm -rf .buildozer/android/platform/build-*/build/other_builds/pyjnius* || true
        rm -rf .buildozer/android/platform/build-*/dists/* || true

    - name: Build APK
      run: |
        # Retry build up to 3 times to handle transient network errors (503, etc)
        for i in 1 2 3; do
          echo "Build attempt $i..."
          yes | buildozer android debug 2>&1 | tee build.log && break
          echo "Build failed, waiting 30 seconds before retry..."
          sleep 30
        done
        # Check if APK was created
        ls -la bin/*.apk 2>/dev/null || (echo "APK not found after 3 attempts" && exit 1)
      timeout-minutes: 120

    - name: Upload build log on failure
      if: failure()
      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
      with:
        name: build-log
        path: build.log
        retention-days: 7

    - name: Upload APK artifact
      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
      with:
        name: youtube-limiter-apk
        path: bin/*.apk
        retention-days: 30

    - name: Create Release (on tag)
      if: startsWith(github.ref, 'refs/tags/')
      uses: softprops/action-gh-release@v1
      with:
        files: bin/*.apk
      env:
        GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
